===Etymology===

===Noun===
{{zh-noun}}

# {{lb|zh|historical}} A [[commandery]] [[administrator]] or [[governor]], the [[official]] [[oversee]]ing a [[commandery]] ([[郡]]) in [[ancient]] [[China]] under the [[Zhou]] and [[Qin]] [[dynasties]].

====Related terms====
* [[太守]], the equivalent position between the Han and Tang dynasties
